name: 8334e6b4-7070-46b7-8e8f-75ac817caa7e
displayName: Search for claims in the Line-item Editor page

text.text: How do I search for claims directly from the Line-item Editor page in Zoll Billing?

text: To search for claims directly from the Line-item Editor page, click the icon and then search using only one field such as the last name or narrow the search by entering information in multiple fields. The search result will show the claim number, service date, patient's name and address, and the claim's balance.

text.text: Can I search for claims using multiple fields simultaneously in the Line-item Editor?

text: Yes, you can search for claims using multiple fields simultaneously in the Line-item Editor. For example, you can enter the payer in the "Current payer" field, enter the exact amount in the "Claim balance" field, and then click Search.

text.text: What information is displayed in the search results when I search for claims in the Line-item Editor?

text: The search results will show the claim number, service date, patient's name and address, and the claim's balance.

text.text: What fields can I use to narrow down my search for claims in the Line-item Editor?

text: You can use the following fields to narrow down your search for claims in the Line-item Editor: last name, service date, claim number, claim balance

text.text: After entering my search criteria, how do I initiate the search for claims in the Line-item Editor?

text: To initiate the search, click the search icon and then click Continue. You can also click the radio button next to the result you want to use and then click Continue.

text.text: What action should I take after finding the desired claim in the search results?

text: You can use the search results to assign the claim to a user.

text.text: How do I select a specific claim from the search results to view its payment details in the Line-item Editor?

text: You can select a specific claim from the search results by clicking the radio button next to the result you want to use and then click Continue. The payment details will display on the Line-item Editor page.

text.text: Is there a way to quickly search for a claim by entering its claim number in the Line-item Editor?

text: Yes, you can quickly search for a claim by entering its claim number in the Line-item Editor. When entering a number in the 'Claim #' field, the type-ahead results will now display the claim balance along with the claim number and service date.

text.text: What additional information is provided in the type-ahead results when I enter a claim number in the 'Claim #' field?

text: When entering a number in the 'Claim #' field, the type-ahead results will now display the claim balance along with the claim number and service date.

text.text: Can I view the claim balance along with other details in the type-ahead results while searching for claims?

text: Yes, you can view the claim balance along with other details in the type-ahead results while searching for claims.

text.text: Are there any limitations on the search criteria that I can use to find claims in the Line-item Editor?

text: You can search using only one field such as the last name or narrow the search by entering information in multiple fields. The search result will show the claim number, service date, patient's name and address, and the claim's balance.

text.text: What should I do if I encounter difficulties finding a specific claim using the search feature in the Line-item Editor?

text: You can also use Advanced Search to find specific claims based on tags, exact claim balance, or claim in a certain profit center. If you want to see all records in the system, just leave all the fields blank and click Search.

text.text: Is there a way to export or save the search results for claims obtained from the Line-item Editor?

text: You can print or download the Advanced Search Results page to a .csv file (limited to less than 50000 records).

text.text: Can I perform advanced searches or apply filters while searching for claims in the Line-item Editor?

text: You can also use Advanced Search to find specific claims based on tags, exact claim balance, or claim in a certain profit center. If you want to see all records in the system, just leave all the fields blank and click Search.

text.text: How to Search for Claims in the Line-item Editor?

text: To search for claims in the Line-item Editor, you can use the search icon. The search result will show the claim number, service date, patient's name and address, and the claim's balance. You can also use Advanced Search to find specific claims based on tags, exact claim balance, or claim in a certain profit center. If you want to see all records in the system, just leave all the fields blank and click Search.
